item.title: Done messing up enough with the looks of...
item.description: Done messing up enough with the looks of my old blog for the day. Have exams this week and haven’t studied a thing. Need to take a week’s break from the net. ;) On another note: I have restored my website: TechGlider.in during this Ragam. Do take a look at …and, we’re back!.
